thread.section_title: Pelican Water Systems Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Pelican Water Systems | pelicanwater.com
thread.title: Mango Man
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by Mango Man

author: Mango Man
title: Mango Man
text: I have been consistently surprised by the high quality of all the parts of my Pelican whole-house water filter. They always provide everything you need (sometimes more) and the instructions are clear. The only downside is their prices seem a little high, but I feel like they are reasonable considering the quality.
